texts.text: 1.17 was a version of PlayStation 4 Edition released on July 1, 2015.[1] [edit]

1 Additions
1.1 General
1.2 Blocks and items
1.3 General
2 Changes
2.1 General
2.2 Blocks and items
3 Fixes
4 See also
5 References

Enabled USB keyboard use for book and quill.
Added LittleBigPlanet Mash-up Pack trial content.

Acacia and dark oak wood planks, wood, stairs, slabs, fences, fence gates and doors
Only obtainable by modding the game.
Iron trapdoor, inverted daylight sensor, book and quill, stained glass, stained glass panes, and spruce, birch and jungle fences, fence gates and doors

Added custom superflat UI, allowing players to customize superflat world generation.
Added new in-game options to allow changing game mode, difficulty setting, time of day and spawn position per player and disable or enable ambient cave sounds and weather settings.
Added classic crafting option.

Split load/join interface into create/load/join.
Changed game mode selection to a slider.

Rose now uses poppy texture.
Quick equip for armor.
Door recipe makes 3 doors instead of one.
Fence recipe now uses 4 planks and 2 sticks instead of 6 sticks.
Beacon beams now change colors when stained glass or stained glass panes are placed over the beam.

MCCE-112 – When renaming items in Creative mode, the chatpad spacebar does not work.
MCCE-124 – Game freezes constantly
MCCE-127 – Home screen multiplayer bug
MCCE-182 – players can not open trapped chest
MCCE-203 – Blocks not dropping when mined / blocks and item drops flying to the side
MCCE-204 – Character freezing when players are far from each other in local multiplayer
MCCE-207 – blocks not dropping when mined
MCCE-209 – Minecart from a Dispenser causes you to float
MCCE-222 – Game locking up during choose saved game
MCCE-223 – Barrier block bug
MCCE-233 – Texture loading causes game to hard lock and crash
MCCE-239 – Random crash when clicking "Play Game"
MCCE-240 – Block drops a few blocks away from where it was mined.
MCCE-244 – Blocks disappearing when mined
MCCE-254 – Harvested blocks/items appearing in wrong places
MCCE-259 – Blocks sometimes spawn on the surface of the earth when mining underground and logs sometimes fly 10 blocks away
MCCE-268 – Items go up through blocks
MCCE-270 – Blocks glitch through walls
MCCE-274 – PS3: Incorrect TNT explosions
MCCE-275 – Invisible blocks bug
MCCE-276 – Blocks going vertical when mined
MCCE-294 – Entitys drop incorrectly
MCCE-299 – Block disappearing bug

Fixed a crash when a lot of redstone dust was used.
Fixed various incorrect tooltip issues.
Fix for an issue with corrupt capes on characters.
Fix for an issue where players could open trapped chests, droppers, hoppers and beacons even though "Can Open Containers" was off.
Fixed a crash when a flaming arrow shot from a dispenser hits TNT.
Fixed a memory leak causing crashes after prolonged play sessions.
Fixed a problem with dropped items sinking below the ground.
Fixed an issue with TNT explosions.
Fixed a problem with baby villagers' collision height.

Xbox 360 Edition TU25
Xbox One Edition CU14
PlayStation 3 Edition 1.17
PlayStation Vita Edition 1.17
"Minecraft: PlayStation 4 Edition Patch change logs" – Minecraft Forum, July 1, 2015.
